```{r}
Mtable = read.csv("D:/Jazz_visual/csv/Musician_table.csv", row.names = 1)[c(-5,-72,-107,-182,-205,-219,-224),]
write.csv(Mtable, 'D:/jazz_visual/csv/Mtable229.csv', na = '')
```

```{r}
yearsActive = as.data.frame(as.character(Mtable$yearsActive_first))
colnames(yearsActive) = 'yearsActive'
rownames(yearsActive) = rownames(Mtable)
```

# Genre
```{r}
yearsActive_split = token_split(yearsActive, g=1)
```

```{r}
yearsActive_ohe = oh_encoding(yearsActive, tok = yearsActive_split$token_list1[-1])
```

```{r}
yearsActive_matrix = yearsActive_ohe$token_matrix

for(i in 1:nrow(yearsActive_matrix)){
  sum_mu = sum(yearsActive_matrix[i,])
  if(sum_mu>1){
    print(sprintf("Multivalue in %s, value: %s", i, sum_mu))
  }
}
```
